title: Scheduler/Data Entry Specialist for a Physical Therapy Clinic
job_overview:
Needed and Wanted. Excellent English Language skills. Excellent data entry skills. Superb communication skills in English. The industry is medical and the specialty is Physical Therapy. Need the ability to talk on the phone with patients and build relationships, You will be calling patients scheduling them for their first appointment. Putting data into the computer. Ideally a person who is a physical therapist with all these attributes would be the ideal candidate.

Please send me a 60 second recording-- a sampling of how you would answer the phone in English.  Or just a general conversation demonstrating your English skills. We will be pre-screening and selecting applicants to interview that have the best English phone voice.
